greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f.: Product_{k=1..n} cosh(k*x).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..235
mathematica: nn = 20; tab = ConstantArray[0,nn]; tab[[1]] = Series[Cosh[x],{x,0,nn}]; Do[tab[[k]] = Series[tab[[k-1]]*Cosh[k*x],{x,0,nn}],{k,2,nn}]; Flatten[{1,Table[k!*Coefficient[tab[[k]],x^k],{k,1,nn}]}] (* more efficient *)
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 04 2014
